entry.title: Cybercrafted
entry.summary: Intro Cybercrafted This is a medium TryHackMe box which houses a Mincraft server. We enumerate subdomains and pages across those subdomains to find a vulnerable page. We find one of those pages is vulnerable to SQL injection which gives us credentials to login to an admin panel. This login brings us to a page which allows us to execute commands on the server. From there we can spawn a reverse...
